text: Britney Spears mobbed by fans on first visit to Israel, cancels dinner with PM Benjamin Netanyahu Britney Spears was ` ` jumped on'' by fans during her first visit to Israel. The megastar was forced to skip dinner with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu after she was mobbed by her followers during a visit to the historical site the Western Wall and security were eventually forced to whisk her away. A source told Ynet, ` ` Hundreds of people jumped on her, and she decided to cancel it all. It was a huge mess, with hundreds of fans and photographers gathered around her. It was a real'Israeli celebration'; she didn't stop an excursion during any other part of her latest tour. This could only happen here.'' Britney landed
